alert.note: Alert for Clearfield; Elk (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:25AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN ELK AND NORTHERN CLEARFIELD COUNTIES THROUGH 500 AM EDT... At 425 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near DuBois, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, DuBois, Ridgway, Sandy, Penfield, Rockton, Karthaus, Force, Benezette, Brandy Camp, Brockport, Parker Dam State Park, Lecontes Mills, S.B. Elliot State Park, Medix Run, Hicks Run, Falls Creek, Kersey, Weedville and Treasure Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
